question: February $1$, $2008$ is a Friday.  The last Friday of February $2008$ will be February $x$, $2008$.  If $2008$ is a leap year, what is the value of $x$?
answer: If 2008 is a leap year, that means there are 29 days in February, and February 29 is $28=7\cdot4$ days after February 1, so it is also a Friday. Thus, $x=\boxed{29}$.
agents_response:
February $2008$ has $29$ days because it is a leap year. Since February $1$, $2008$ is a Friday, every $7$ days from that date will also fall on a Friday. 

Counting $7$ days at a time, we find that the last Friday of February $2008$ will fall on February $29$, $2008$. 

Therefore, the value of $x$ is $\boxed{29}$.
